thread.title: The Standard Names Lin Meng Second Vice President and Associate Actuary

author: cnbc.com
title: The Standard Names Lin Meng Second Vice President and Associate Actuary
text:
PORTLAND, Ore.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Standard Insurance Company (The Standard) has named Lin Meng second vice president and associate actuary.
This press release features multimedia. View the full release here: https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180321005147/en/
Lin Meng, second vice president and associate actuary at The Standard. (Photo: Business Wire)
Meng joins The Standard with more than 13 years of actuarial experience. Most recently, Meng was at Liberty Mutual Insurance where she was responsible for reporting and experience monitoring for its individual life and annuity business. Prior to that, Meng held leadership positions at Sun Life Financial in a variety of areas including risk management, international profitability management and in-force business management.
In her new role, Meng will be responsible for actuarial oversight of pricing and financial reporting as well as Enterprise Risk Management. In addition, she will provide leadership for financial reporting, financial performance measures and financial reviews.
“Lin comes to us with a strong track record in actuarial leadership and we are delighted to have her join the Corporate Actuarial team,” said Sally Manafi, vice president and chief risk officer at The Standard.
Meng earned a Master of Arts degree in educational psychology and a Master of Science degree in actuarial science at the University at Connecticut. She is a Fellow of the Society of Actuaries and a member of the American Academy of Actuaries.
About The Standard
The Standard is a leading provider of financial products and services, including group and individual disability insurance, group life and accidental death and dismemberment insurance, group dental and vision insurance, absence management services, retirement plans products and services and individual annuities. For more information about The Standard, visit www.standard.com .
The Standard is the marketing name for StanCorp Financial Group, Inc., and its subsidiaries: Standard Insurance Company, The Standard Life Insurance Company of New York, Standard Retirement Services, Inc., StanCorp Mortgage Investors, Inc., StanCorp Investment Advisers, Inc., StanCorp Real Estate, LLC, and StanCorp Equities, Inc.
